reviewText: The video features - 2000 Pet of the Year, Juliet - First Runner-Up, Alexus Winston - Second Runner-Up, Aimee Sweet. I guess it's true what they say; Penthouse videos are more revealing than Playboy videos (i.e. you get to see more flesh). The video itself was good; I didn't like Aimee Sweet's performance, however. Aimee Sweet acts like a porn star in this one - she opens her mouth and moans as if she's enjoying it - and ruined the video for me; if I wanted to see that kind of acting, I would've gotten myself some hardcore porno (which I'm not into).
This video is one of the most sensual and titillating videos i have ever seen, a must for any video library.
